head.title: {{EnvName}} {{FileFormatUp}} Comparison API - Check {{FileFormatUp}} Files for Differences
head.description: Compare and merge {{FileFormatUp}} files in {{EnvName}}, J2EE, J2SE applications. Analyze differences summary in content, text & style of {{FileFormatUp}} files, images and document formats.

header.title: Compare {{FileFormatUp}} Files in {{EnvName}}
header.description: Perform content comparison between more than two {{FileFormatUp}} files in {{EnvName}}. Retrieve a list of differences and save the compared files to a single document.
header.subtitle: Documents differences checking framework

about.title: Explore the capabilities of {{ProdFullName}} library
about.content: {{ProdFullName}} is an intrinsic {{EnvName}} software crafted for comparing multiple images and documents sharing the same format. It assists in identifying variations within paragraphs, words, characters, shapes, and even text styles among the compared documents. With the capability to merge these alterations and export to a final document, it facilitates the comparison and merging of PDFs, Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, Visio diagrams, Outlook emails, HTML, drawings, and various image file formatsâ€”eliminating the necessity for any external libraries.

steps.title: How to compare several {{FileFormatUp}} documents using {{EnvName}}

content.title: Use [{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}}) to compare multiple {{FileFormatUp}} files and generate a report detailing their differences
content.step_1: Use your preferred package manager to install {{ProdFullName}} from [{{PackageStoreName}}]({{PackageUrl}})
content.step_2: Create an instance of the Comparer class setting path to one of {{FileFormatUp}} files
content.step_3: Add at least one additional {{FileFormatUp}} to the Comparer instance
content.step_4: Receive a detailed final report outlining the exact differences

comments.comment_1: Check files from your hard drive for differences or similarities
comments.comment_2: Create a Comparer object by specifying the initial file
comments.comment_4: Get the report with the specified name as the result

formats.description: Our {{EnvName}} solutions allows you to compare documents of various formats. Stay updated on document changes by processing them effortlessly.

head.title: Use the Comparison library along with {{EnvName}} to check PDF documents diffs.
head.description: The {{ProdShortName}} {{EnvName}} API creates detailed reports for PDF documents in applications that support J2EE and J2SE.

header.title: Comparing PDF documents using {{EnvName}} applications
header.description: The {{ProdShortName}} {{EnvName}} library provides detailed comparison reports for PDF documents in various kinds of applications that use J2EE or J2SE.

about.title: Find out {{ProdFullName}} API advantages
about.content: Genuine {{ProdFullName}} API is crafted for composing reports full of useful data about differences inside PDF documents. Not only differences in text within paragraphs or words but also changes in shapes and text styles are represented at final report. Merging these alterations and exporting to a final document available too. In fact, there no need in external libraries. Only a few lines of code grant access to rich functionality.

content.title: Compare PDFs with [{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}}) and get reports about documents distinctions
content.step_1: Download {{ProdFullName}} package from [{{PackageStoreName}}]({{PackageUrl}}) and install it
content.step_2: New Comparer instance must has path to one of PDF files
content.step_3: At least one PDF document must be provided for comparison
content.step_4: Result report is saved to provided path

comments.comment_1: Getting report about changes at PDFs
comments.comment_2: Pass first file path to Comparer constructor
comments.comment_4: Save distinctions report for future analyzing
